usefulItems: freezable containers (e.g. aluminium, silicone), cling film, freezer
title: Anko Ice Cream

preparations.content: Place red bean paste and condensed milk in mixing bowl then mix <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>-8 increasing speed gradually<b>. Transfer mixture to a freezable container, cover with cling film and freeze for 10 hours or until ready to serve.
Remove from freezer just before serving.
